snippet.title: Dawn of Defiance - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Your odyssey begins! We are excited to launch Dawn of Defiance, the open-world, survival-crafting game inspired by ancient Greek mythology, now available in early access on Steam and the Epic Games Store for $19.99, plus a 25% launch discount available until August 29. Combining all the essentials of the survival genre with divine powers, expansive crafting, and co-op multiplayer for up to four players, Dawn of Defiance invites players to rise up and become a legend.

For more info: https://www.dawnofdefiance.com
Buy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2059530   
Buy on Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/p/dawn-of-defiance-b4f0ca 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/traegagames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TraegaEntertainment
Twitter: https://twitter.com/traegagames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@traegagames
Discord: https://discord.gg/dV6s7CHHZj
